name: Content Ignition

overview:
Content Ignition is a leading data generator company, operating worldwide.

The 3 main focus of our team are: Lead Generation, Email Marketing and Web Content Monetization.

Therefore, our solutions, campaigns and projects use:

  • Lead generation
  • Data Collection
  • Data Base Rental
  • Co-Registration
  • Sponsorship
  • E-mail Marketing
  • Viral Marketing
  • And much moreâ€¦

Aside from the European Market, where we operate in Portugal, Spain, France, Italy, UK, Germany, etc, Content Ignition already operates in more markets, like Brazil, Mexico and USA.

Content Ignition develops innovative on-line campaigns that enable our clients to reach their marketing/business objectives by increasing their Database.
